s.text: His peroration was "As they say, mount up and ride to the sound of the guns."
The subhead over USAT 's Y2K story says the Senate report "cites vulnerability but little risk of disaster" and the story proper quickly includes calming words from two senators.
The WP goes above the fold with a picture for Pat Buchanan's decision to run for president for a third time.
Gradualism has the advantage of allowing for a combination of new spending and tax cuts near-term and shoring up Social Security in the long haul.
